questions.quote: I gotta go to the Dixieland Deli to pick up Mr. Pitt's security pass for the parade.
Johnny? Johnny who? Johnny Carson? Did I insult Johnny on The Tonight Show?
How did you get the goop out of the top of the dishwashing liquid? It was like a brand-new nozzle!
I think the chair is a fantastic gift idea. But I never heard of this Joe Mayo. And frankly, it sounds made up.
This could be in a museum some day! It's not safe with me! It should really be in a doormanned building.
What's the difference? I agreed to wear it. It's - it's a puffy shirt. I feel ridiculous in it, and I think it's the stupidest shirt I've ever seen, to be perfectly honest with you.
You just had to go lookin' for it, didn't you? See, you hate it that I have a little secret. Anything I do -- oooh, oooh! -- you gotta know all about it. You're so OBSESSED with me.
I-I'm already here. I'm here. I'm here. Uh, you know what? If you want a computer, call me. I-I gotta go.
I'm not a phony an' I don't want anything to do with this guy.
Look at that guy.  I'll bet you he's gettin' hair transplants. Any time you see a guy that age wearing a baseball cap, ten to one - plugs.
